title: open team format for normal games
body:
hey lol world,
are you sick of all the in team fighting...
the afks...
the rage....
and all the stupidity that comes with playing normal games...
What I am looking to do is have an open team format for normal games with approved players that won't rage etc on you so you know you can have a good game. How it works is there are basically a few administrators who will be on, and if the see behavior that should be reported than your out of the team. The group will be in contact via facebook, viber etc. 
The plan is to have about 20+ people so there is always people to play with. will be an open format so you dont have to be locked into lanes either.
add me in game or leave a comment below.
cheer

replies.body: Disregarding the reply I made earlier, I'd be happy to play with you, add me in-game!
